text:
Yo Bhorse,
Poore college me sbse jyaada time mene most probably there saath kuch bakchodi krte hue hi spend kia ha . Classes se bulla ,courses me ek saath fudge* up hona, body banane ke lie alag alag plan banana,the list is neverending. You are one of the chillest people I know.You have been with me in my highs and lows during past few years,Thanks for that.
One more thing -Bro , teri art skill boht cool ha , i could only imagine myself drawing something like what u do.
I wish you happiness in years to come and may our friendship last forever.
Apne paas to abi 1 saal ha aurðŸ˜‚, thodi bakchodi reh gyi ha.Love you bro!
author: Ashish  Dhiman

text:
Hey dude,
It's been amazing being your friend for which no words suffice. As a roommate, you were more than helpful, and a great company for hanging out. From GBM sessions in the fresher year to watching the cricket world cup on projector with wingies , we have a lot of fun experiences. You are among the most passionate, empathetic, and cool persons I know at IITK.

I wish you a very happy life ahead and may our friendship and memories live forever. Love you, bro!
author: Ashish  Dhiman

text:
Me Pehle memoir banane ka plan kr r tha but bro as always tu dil ki baat padh leta ha.Itni saaari memories ha and best ones are with you bhai.
vo din to me kbhi ni bhuluga jab nachi ke room gye the ,that day changed everything .Our bonding grew stronger than ever from that day.Room pe nye dance moves krna , saath me movies dekhna (MI Fallout ka vo scene yaad ha tujhe- where's the needle ... didn't need it)ðŸ¤£ ,every single memory boht happiness deti ha really .Bhorse ,tu oor me doing epic bakchodi,I miss it yaar. 
Bro you are most kind, passionate and helpful person I know.Chill in all situations , always first in the line when someone needs help.Gym session ho yaa bhand hone ka session ,you make every single second worth remembering.
 Your singing and guitar skills are love broðŸ’•,keep it up .
me bhi chahta tha last me time milta saath me or bakchodi krne ka (it's never enough) ,but bro we'll plan a trip together sometime in the near future pkaa. Love you bro.Stay healthy ,take care and best of luck for your future plans brother.
I am always here for you and I know you are tooðŸ˜„
author: Ashish  Dhiman
